name: Gjallarhorn
flavor_text: “If there is beauty in destruction, why not also in its delivery?” — Feizel Crux

frame.name: Wolfpack Rounds
frame.description: Rounds fired split into tracking cluster missiles upon detonation.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Alloy Casing

perks.description: Gain increased handling and reload speed when standing near allies. Firing this weapon also grants Wolfpack Rounds to nearby allies wielding non-Exotic Rocket Launchers.
perks.name: Pack Hunter

perks.description:
This weapon is especially easy to grip.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
perks.name: Short-Action Stock
